wordpressPage.title: About
wordpressPage.content:
I am is a freelance developer with several years of experience working as a WordPress expert at Codeable and Upwork and has helped many clients around the world by building their online presence through high quality custom theme development.

►►

“Worked well under a tight deadline – competent understanding of our usual development methodology, which has been difficult to find amongst other freelancers. Hope to be working with Zakir again on a project soon.”

“Awesome guy. A problem solver and thinks ahead.”

“I’ve worked with Zakir for several years now. He is able to work with very little supervision if you just provide PSDs. That saves me time. Thanks again Zakir!”

“Our experience with Zakir was tremendous – he helped us completely redesign our site this past summer. He was able to complete complex tasks and integrate several large plugins, and he was also very honest when he thought there was a better way to accomplish a certain task. Zakir always has your best interest in mind!”

“Awesome developer. He helped me work through my issues quickly and professionally. He is very communicative and has expert knowledge about wordpress. I was really happy with his services.”

▬ ▬
I’m a full-stack WordPress Developer (Yes both front and backend) with WooCommerce experience.

►► HIGHLIGHTS

✔ Master’s degree in Software Engineering.
✔ 7+ years of experience as a WordPress+PHP developer.
✔ Front-end skills – HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript, Gatsby, GraphQL, jQuery, Bootstrap and Responsive Design.
✔ Back-end skills – Experience building custom themes, plugins with WordPress, PHP, MYSQL.
✔ Experience with modern-day development tools including CSS preprocessors(SASS), CSS structuring tools like BEM, task automation (gulp/grunt/NPM), version control (git/Github).
✔ Solid LAMP Experience.
✔ Integrate a wide range of WordPress plugins, API calls, and third-party apps, CRM and forms
✔ Develop, test and troubleshoot across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices, to support the consistent and positive customer experience.

►► Core services

▬ Full website creation in WordPress, PHP, SASS, JavaScript. Usually, the client sends me HTML version/PSD/Sketch/Zeplin and I develop a complete WordPress theme from scratch. I use understrap starter theme. Typical development workflow: NPM, SASS, Gulp, Webpack.

▬ E-commerce with WooCommerce. Features include: Bookings/Subscriptions/Memberships/Drop-shipping/Affiliate Store/Paid Job Listings/Marketplace.

▬ WordPress plugin development. Bring your plugin idea and I will implement it for you.

▬ Development of static sites using Gatsby, GraphQL, the data source is WordPress and hosted free on Netlify.
